label: Msg_AN_01
text:
Happy birthday! How you feelin'?
Stronger? More agile? Maybe a
bit wiser? Well, guess what—you're
all of the above! So here's to great
stats, and another year of you
bein' your fearless self. Go you!

label: Msg_AN_02
text:
OK, this is kinda embarrassin' to
say, but every day I get even more
stoked to be on this island with
you. So happy birthday, and thanks
for being you. 2\0n	\0
wouldn't be the same without you.

label: Msg_AN_03
text:
I hope this day finds you well on 
your joyous birthday... No, I can't
do all this fancy-talk stuff. So yeah,
HAPPY B-DAY! Thanks for bein' my
pal. It means a lot. I can't wait to
see the mischief we get into next!

label: Msg_BO_01
text:
It's real neat that your birthday 
happens every year. It happened
THIS year, and it'll happen next
year, and the year after that, and
the year after that... Man. I gotta
put all this on my calendar.

label: Msg_BO_02
text:
Hearing "Happy birthday!" a bunch
on your birthday is good luck.
Happybirthdayhappybirthdayhappy
birthdayhappybirthdayhappybirthd
ayhappybirthdayhappybirthdayhapp
ybirthdayhappybirthdayhappybirthd

label: Msg_BO_03
text:
When it's birthday time that means
it's cake time. And cake time is
when I smush my face in the cake
and eat it all as fast as I can. I get
yelled at, but I can't hear it 'cause
of all the icing in my ears. Win-win.

label: Msg_doc
text:
Heard time just put a +1 on your
payload—congrats! This is your
friendly reminder to enjoy some
R&R today, and be sure to wear
your sandals out before you blow
those candles out!

label: Msg_dod
text:
I wish I could celebrate with you
today, but at least I can take
advantage of our state-of-the-art
Dodo Airlines postal services to
wish you a happy birthday! Dodo
Airlines: When Waddling Won't Do.

label: Msg_FU_01
text:
Here's hoping your birthday is full
of laughter. I can't think of anyone
more deserving of an awesome day.
I can say that your smile always
cheers me up, and that you make
life here better for everyone!

label: Msg_FU_02
text:
Happy birthday to you with all my
heart! I hope you know how much
you mean to everyone here. You've
been like a gift to our community,
and you bring so much joy into our
lives every day, just by being you!

label: Msg_FU_03
text:
Happy birthday! I'm so glad you're
in my life so we can share good
times on this island together.
I hope it's been just as fun for you.
My wish for you is that your coming
year is full of laughs and smiles.

label: Msg_GE_01
text:
This year it's K.K. serenading you
on your birthday. Someday he'll be
my opening act when I serenade 
you on your birthday. I'm so happy
you're looking forward to it as
much as I am!

label: Msg_GE_02
text:
Do something crazy, like skydiving!
I did that on my b-day one year.
Took a class, suited up, and jumped
out of a plane! I have no idea what
I was thinking! I screamed all the
way down and an hour after that!

label: Msg_GE_03
text:
You're not just my BFF, you're my
CBHBFFAEY too! That means,
"My Coolest Birthday-Having Best
Friend Forever and Ever, YAY!"
You're the only CBHBFFAEY that
I have, so I'm pretty lucky!

label: Msg_HA_01
text:
Happy birthday! I gotta tell you,
whenever I see your ultra delts and
mega biceps, I get SUPER pumped
to up my game. My giant muscles
wouldn't be what they are without 
you to inspire them. Thanks!

label: Msg_HA_02
text:
Happy birthday! Meeting you totally
changed my life. My muscles got
bigger, my lap times got shorter, my
bench weight heavier... What I'm
saying is, you're the best. Now 
have yourself a birthday FLEX!

label: Msg_HA_03
text:
Happy birthday! Did your muscles
get...musclier this year? 'Cause
seriously, I am in awe. And I can't
wait to see what the next year's
got in store. This flex is for you...
OK, I just flexed and it was great.

label: Msg_hgh
text:
I heard today is your birthday!
Congratulations and happy birthday
and all that! I hope your day is
super fun, and please stop by the
shop soon—we'd love to see you!

label: Msg_hgs
text:
I don't usually write letters, so
please forgive me if I sound a bit
stiff. I wanted to wish you a very
happy birthday. I hope you find the
time to reflect on the year you've
just finished and what lies ahead.

label: Msg_KO_01
text:
Surprised to be gettin' a message
from me? Dunno why you would be.
This is your big day, and there's no
better time for your pals to check
in and tell you how great you are!
Here's to you, n\0!

label: Msg_KO_02
text:
Havin' a good day? Must feel neat
knowin' there's a concert bein' put
on in your honor today! In case you
didn't know it already, folks around
here care about you and are glad
you're here on our island with us.

label: Msg_KO_03
text:
I should be tellin' you this to your
face instead of writin', but I just
gotta say I'm proud to be your pal.
I sure am glad we have a day just
for celebratin' you, 'cause you're
the best and you deserve the best.

label: Msg_OT_01
text:
I confess, I am full of emotions on
your birthday. It's just... I'm so
very grateful for you! You are
fabulous beyond words, and I wish
you every happiness in the world.

label: Msg_OT_02
text:
Happiest of birthdays! Please know
that I am going to work hard to
make this another wonderful year
for you. I do hope you'll continue
to grace me with your friendship.
It means the world to me!

label: Msg_OT_03
text:
Happy birthday! It has been such
a delight watching you be the very
best you this past year. Keep up
the good work! May our friendship
continue to grow so I can wish you
a happy birthday year after year!

label: Msg_owl
text:
A little bird told me that today is
the anniversary of your birth, a
most felicitous event that warrants
the greatest of celebrations!
I hope the day brings you the same
joy you so often bring to others.

label: Msg_rcm
text:
Happy Birthday! You're always
helping us in so many ways. I hope
you'll continue to shop at Nook's
Cranny and stop in to say hi to me
and my brother every so often.
We'll be waiting!

label: Msg_rco
text:
Happy Birthday! I don't say it
enough, but, n\0,
you are such an important part of
n	\0. Yes, yes! You
make sure that this coming year is
truly a great one!

label: Msg_rct
text:
Happy Birthday! Did you know that
every day my brother and I look
forward to seeing you in the shop?
You always seem so busy to me,
but I hope you remember to take
a break every now and then.

label: Msg_sza
text:
Just wanted to say Happy Birthday!
I hope the year is full of wonderful
things for you, n\0. I
may need to lean on you from time
to time, but I hope we'll be friends
for all the years to come!

label: Msg_ZK_01
text:
I'm so excited to celebrate your
birthday this year that it almost
feels like it's MY birthday! Don't
worry—I'm not expecting any gifts.
Seriously, though...have the best
birthday ever, n\0!

label: Msg_ZK_02
text:
Happy Birthday! Another year
older, another year awesomer.
Getting to know you has been
super fun, and I can't wait for
another year of it! I hope you do
something extra special today.

label: Msg_ZK_03
text:
Congratulations on completing
another trip around that giant
fireball in the sky! I'm so grateful
for all the memories we've made
together, n\0...
Please excuse the tear stains.
